snippet.title: Oblitus mortis - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic 2D adventure with this pixel art style game, a metroidvania set in a world full of legends and myths of Venezuela. Explore various scenarios, face mythical creatures and discover ancient secrets in this incredible odyssey.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3434340/Oblitus_mortis/

La manera de financiar el proyecto es con la venta de el libro BESTIARIO VENEZOLANO
https://a.co/d/cqlGbJM
Paypal
https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/ONEHI
